SELECT (COUNT(*)-1) DIV #{size} + 1 FROM CORPORATION C JOIN PRICE P ON C.Cno = P.Cno where P.date = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND #{min} <= P.change_rate*100 and P.change_rate*100 <= #{max}
AND C.cname like CONCAT('%', #{cname},'%')
AND C.cname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cname},'%')
ORDER BY C.Cno
ORDER BY C.CNO DESC
ORDER BY P.change_rate
ORDER BY P.change_rate DESC

SELECT * FROM CORPORATION C JOIN PRICE P ON C.Cno = P.Cno where P.date = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND #{min} <= P.change_rate*100 and P.change_rate*100 <= #{max}
AND C.cname like CONCAT('%', #{cname},'%')
AND C.cname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cname},'%')
ORDER BY C.Cno
ORDER BY C.CNO DESC
ORDER BY P.change_rate
ORDER BY P.change_rate DESC
LIMIT ${skip}, ${size};

SELECT C.SECTOR, AVG(change_rate) AS change_rate FROM CORPORATION C JOIN PRICE P ON C.CNO = P.CNO WHERE P.DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY SECTOR ORDER BY AVG(CHANGE_RATE) DESC LIMIT #{num};
